rows.label: tlk70000068_03_msg0001
rows.name:
A gardener's job isn't just pushing
around rocks and sand to make
everything look pretty, you know.

rows.label: tlk70000068_03_msg0002
rows.name:
My dad says it's all about cultivating
relationships between plants and the
soil.

rows.label: tlk70000068_03_msg0003
rows.name:
You have to know about all sorts of
stuff or the garden will fail. My dad
says it's like being a doctor for nature.

rows.label: tlk70000068_03_msg0004
rows.name:
So a gardener's real job is making sure
the garden is healthy. That helps keep
the people who visit it healthy, too.

rows.label: tlk70000068_03_msg0005
rows.name:
It goes over my head a bit. I've spent a
lot of time with my dad, but I've never
thought about gardening like that at all.
